scripts.sassfiles: mkdir sass\base sass\utils sass\layouts sass\components sass\pages sass\themes sass\vendors && echo @import "./utils/"; > sass/main.scss && echo . && echo @import "./vendors/"; >> sass/main.scss && echo . && echo @import "./base/"; >> sass/main.scss && echo . && echo @import "./components/"; >> sass/main.scss && echo . && echo @import "./layouts/"; >> sass/main.scss && echo . && echo @import "./pages/"; >> sass/main.scss && echo . && echo @import "./themes/"; >> sass/main.scss
